mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (U_ID, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME , BIRTH, PHONE, ADD1, ADD2, GENDER, GRADE, EMAIL) VALUES(SEQ_USERS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname} , #{birth}, #{phone}, #{add1}, #{add2}, #{gender}, #{grade}, #{email} )
